= Introduction =

Here is the template for the message object string which is to be sent from UI to native. 

<message>

<messageType>sync/async</messageType>
<sessionJob>true/false</sessionJob>
<sessionId></sessionId>
<targetObject>getAllAvailableClasses</targetObject>
<argumentXml>...</argumentXml>


</message>
